## Worm interface

Worm API.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface Worm 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [attemptSolve(session)](./bitburner.worm.attemptsolve.md) | Attempts to solve the given session with the specified properties. |
|  [createNewSession()](./bitburner.worm.createnewsession.md) | Creates a new session. |
|  [getCompletions()](./bitburner.worm.getcompletions.md) | Get the current completion count of the Worm. |
|  [getContractInfluence()](./bitburner.worm.getcontractinfluence.md) | Get the current multiplier the amount of coding contracts solved has on the Worm processing time. |
|  [getFinishedSession(session)](./bitburner.worm.getfinishedsession.md) | Get a finished session object by its identifier. |
|  [getFinishedSessions()](./bitburner.worm.getfinishedsessions.md) | Get all finished sessions. |
|  [getParams(session)](./bitburner.worm.getparams.md) | Get the chosen nodes for the node specific properties. |
|  [getSessionLimit()](./bitburner.worm.getsessionlimit.md) | Get the maximum number of sessions that can be active at a time. |
|  [getSessionMaxReward(session)](./bitburner.worm.getsessionmaxreward.md) | Get the maimum reward possible for a given session. |
|  [getSessionTestsDone(session)](./bitburner.worm.getsessiontestsdone.md) | Get the number of tests that have already been done in the session. |
|  [getStates(session)](./bitburner.worm.getstates.md) | Get the current states the Worm has. |
|  [getSymbols(session)](./bitburner.worm.getsymbols.md) | Get the current symbols of the Worm. |
|  [getTestingTime(threads, player)](./bitburner.worm.gettestingtime.md) | Get the current testing time. |
|  [getUnsolvedSessions()](./bitburner.worm.getunsolvedsessions.md) | Get all unsolved sessions. |
|  [setBonus(bonus)](./bitburner.worm.setbonus.md) | Set the bonus of the Worm. |
|  [setDepthFirstSearchState(session, state)](./bitburner.worm.setdepthfirstsearchstate.md) | Sets the depth first search order property of the given session. The chosen index can be gathered using the respective API function. |
|  [setIsBipartite(session, bipartite)](./bitburner.worm.setisbipartite.md) | Sets the bipartite property of the given session. |
|  [setNodeIndegree(session, indegree)](./bitburner.worm.setnodeindegree.md) | Sets the indegree property of the given session. The chosen state can be gathered using the respective API function. |
|  [setNodeValue(session, value)](./bitburner.worm.setnodevalue.md) | Sets the value property of the given session. The chosen state can be gathered using the respective API function. |
|  [setShortestPath(session, path)](./bitburner.worm.setshortestpath.md) | Sets the shortest path property of the given session. |
|  [testInput(session, input)](./bitburner.worm.testinput.md) | Tests a given input against the given session. |
